exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ShipSkin" width="80" height="45" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="g_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image width="1280" height="580" horizontalCenter="0" source="l1b_jpg" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="ship_bg1" source="s7_png" y="0" anchorOffsetX="72" locked="true"/>
	<ns1:Ship id="ship1" skinName="ShipSkin" y="110" anchorOffsetX="40"/>
	<e:Image id="ship_bg2" source="s7_png" y="0" anchorOffsetX="72" locked="true"/>
	<ns1:Ship id="ship2" skinName="ShipSkin" y="110" anchorOffsetX="40"/>
	<e:Label id="score_txt" text="+999" x="293" y="100" textColor="0xE211EE" bold="true" fontFamily="Comic Sans MS" width="81"/>
	<e:Label id="total_score_txt" text="0" horizontalCenter="-401" y="35" width="109" textColor="0xDD0BE5" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label text="总分" horizontalCenter="-495" y="35" textColor="0xC615D7"/>
	<e:Label id="total_score_txt2" text="0" horizontalCenter="495" y="35" width="109" textColor="0xDD0BE5" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label text="总分" horizontalCenter="401" y="35" textColor="0xC615D7"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainSceneSkin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="t_jpg" width="1280" height="720" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="start_btn" source="zz_ng_png" y="462" width="217" height="79" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>
